bio:
Young BA in Communication with Degree. Experience in Social Media Strategist, Manager & Community Manager.

Management & analysis in social media: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Blogs (Wordpress, Blogger & Joomla!), Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, YouTube, Vimeo, Google Plus, Tumblr, Foursquare, Flickr, Vine, Intagram, Pinterest, MySpace, Hi5, etc.

Website administration & knowledge on Internet and HTML. 

Skill in customer service. 
Marketing & digital communication. Communication Research.

Knowedge in print, electronic, digital media & journalism.

Accustomed to working under pressure and team. Leadership. Common sense and tact in relating to others. Frustration tolerance. 

Control of different programs such as Microsoft Office, Photoshop, Illustrator. Facultad de Estudios Superiores Acatln (UNAM) Lic.
